definition: until the end of time (idiom)
day/sky/heaven
desolate/shortage/scarce/out of practice/absurd/uncultivated/to neglect
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Glebe's old hero bereavement, Hugh death cause.
sentences.chinese: 天荒地老英雄喪，國破家亡事業休。

sentences.english: I have not hid in the bottom of my heart, that is I a person's death.
sentences.chinese: 涐把捨不得都藏在心底，那是涐一個人旳天荒地老。

sentences.english: Love, I want to continue to continue until the end of time.
sentences.chinese: 愛情，我希望能夠繼續延續下去，直到天荒地老。

sentences.english: No one wants to wait for you, do not say wait until forever in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人願意等你，也不必說等到天荒地老，海枯石爛。

sentences.english: Love to everlasting, the final outcome again how.
sentences.chinese: 愛到天荒地老，最後的結局又能怎樣。

sentences.english: Or with your family, friends, lovers, chatting until the end of the world.
sentences.chinese: 或是和家人，朋友，戀人坐著聊天到天荒地老。

sentences.english: I can pull your hand, accompanied you to arrive in ancient times, dry seas and crumbling rocks.
sentences.chinese: 我會牽着你的手，陪你到天荒地老，海枯石爛。

sentences.english: I shall love you until the end of universe as long as you love me back.
sentences.chinese: 我將愛你直到天荒地老只要你也待我如司。

sentences.english: Seasons may change winter to spring, but I love you till the end of time.
sentences.chinese: 四季輪迴，冬去春來，但是我將愛你到天荒地老。

definition: see 天荒地老[tian1 huang1 di4 lao3]
lit. when the seas run dry and the stones go soft (idiom)/fig. forever/until the end of time
enduring while the world lasts (idiom)/eternal
a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
hoary head/old age
see 天涯海角[tian1 ya2 hai3 jiao3]
from dawn to dusk/all the time
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
Cape Haijiao in Sanya 三亞|三亚[San1 ya4], Hainan
the ends of the earth/separated worlds apart
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
to stay together/to rely on one another
to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
to moisten with spittle (idiom); sharing meager resources/mutual help in humble circumstances
enduring while the world lasts (idiom, from Laozi); eternal/for ever and ever (of friendship, hate etc)/also written 天長地久|天长地久
faithful unto death (i.e. Confucian ban on widow remarrying)
